title: Fitness for living: how to get fit
creator_contributor_role: Walt Disney Educational Media Company, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physical fitness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Exercise
description: This film shows ways of getting fit and suggests that regular practice of specific exercises is the key to developing strength and endurance; that slow continuous exercise such as jogging or bicycling develops the heart and lungs; that weight training augments muscle strength. Suitable for secondary level.
